attributes.action: Award all deceased front line COVD-19 workers with a Posthumous Award.
attributes.additional_details:
These brave, couragious and caring people have lost their lives to save others to be with their families and friends once more. While these front line workers have left families and friends behind. 

These are the people that are shaping our future, these are the people who are keeping britian running, these are the people who have sacrificed they're life to save others. They're names should be known to the country.
attributes.background: Following the rise in COVID-19 cases we should award all front line workers who's sacrafice has ended their lives a lot sooner by helping patients, elderly and the vulnerable during the virus.
